description: Nurarihyon hurriedly went to Osaka Castle to save Youhime. He challenge Hagoromo-Gitsune and her clan, he manage to defeat her with the help of his comrades and Hidemoto (13th head of Kekain Family). After, Nurarihyon became "The Lord of Pandemonium" and his clan the most powerful of all. Youhime realized that she was in love with Nurarihyon and decided to stay by his side for her entire life.
